title: Recent Frame Lag Issues
body: Ever since one update that was automatically installed on my laptop, my frame rate has significantly decreased while playing League and the game has been acting up in weird ways. There seem to be problems with chat glitches, as well as consistently lower frame rates (I used to play at 150+ frames, now it never goes above 60, even with no cap on frames and all settings exactly the same). My laptop has Windows 10 and am pretty sure it automatically upgrades drivers. Anyone experiencing this as well or any ideas how to fix?

replies.body:
I've been seeing an influx of this type of issue popping up here on H&S. It seems most of the time, it's caused by the Windows 10 Anniversary update that enabled the Game DVR feature for games. I suggest [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes with this.

Let me know if this helped.
I figured it was just a setting change somewhere, but that definitely helped. Frames are back to normal after disabling the feature, thanks!
